descriptionHtml:
[size=2][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61185-1-1420325777.jpg[/img]

____________________________________________________________________

First of all,
I'm not good at English, sorry.
____________________________________________________________________

[About]
BeeDee, is a female follower.
is stand-alone type.
is Essential.
is Healer type (non-script).

and Especially,
She's a Meridian Servant (unique class).
She has a unique healing spell called "Meridian Whisper", andÂ 
has a unique healing staff called "Meridian Whisper Staff".

She's not so tough, but helps you just a little,
......maybe.

____________________________________________________________________

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61185-1-1420327656.jpg[/img]

She might not want to use any weapons.
She uses only Spells and Staffs.
____________________________________________________________________

[Character]
B.D.

[Location]
[u]Hall of the Dead, in Falkreath.
[/u](why does she stay here? - That's all Meridia only knows.)

[Body-type]
UNP
Height 0.80 / Weight 0.00

[Level]
10 - 120 (PC sync)

[Marriage]
Not.

[Class]
"Meridian Servant" (Unique)

[Combat style]
Custom (magic/staff)

[Spell]
Healing
Firebolt
Steadfast Ward
"Meridian Whisper"(unique)

[Perk]
Novice Destruction
Apprentice Destruction
Novice Restoration
Apprentice Restoration
Novice Illusion
Novice Alteration
Apprentice Alteration
